Package nonogram

Class NonogramUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • nonogram.NonogramUI
  • public class NonogramUI
extends java.lang.Object
    A text-based user interface to a Nonogram puzzle.
    Version:
    September 2022
    Author:
    Dr Mark C. Sinclair

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public java.lang.String display​(boolean showFullOnly)
        A string representation of a Nonogram puzzle suitable for console display If showFullOnly is set, the unknown cells are shown as empty.
        Parameters:
        showFullOnly - show all non full cells as empty
        Returns:
        a string representation of the puzzle for display

      • display

        public java.lang.String display()
        A string representation of a Nonogram puzzle suitable for console display
        Returns:
        a string representation of the puzzle for display

      • menu

        public void menu()
        Main control loop. This displays the puzzle, then enters a loop displaying a menu, getting the user command, executing the command, displaying the puzzle and checking if further moves are possible

      • numFromChar

        public static int numFromChar​(char c)
        Get a number from a character representation (0-9A-Za-z)
        Parameters:
        c - the character representation
        Returns:
        the integer representation (or -1 on error)

      • numAsChar

        public static char numAsChar​(int i)
        Get a character representation (0-9A-Za-z) of a number
        Parameters:
        i - the integer (must be positive)
        Returns:
        the character representation (or '?' on error)

      • isValidStateChar

        public static boolean isValidStateChar​(char c)
        Check if a character represents a valid cell state
        Parameters:
        c - the character
        Returns:
        true if this character represents a vaild cell state, otherwise false

      • seqAsChar

        public static java.lang.String seqAsChar​(java.lang.String seq,
                                         boolean showFullOnly)
        Convert a cell state sequence string into a string representation using the display characters. If showFullOnly is set, the unknown cells are shown as empty.
        Parameters:
        seq - the cell state sequence
        showFullOnly - show all non full cells as empty
        Returns:
        the sequence ready for display

      • seqAsChar

        public static java.lang.String seqAsChar​(java.lang.String seq)
        Convert a cell state sequence string into a string representation using the display characters.
        Parameters:
        seq - the cell state sequence
        Returns:
        the sequence ready for display

      • stateAsChar

        public static char stateAsChar​(int state)
        Convert an individual cell state into a display character
        Parameters:
        state - the cell state
        Returns:
        the character ready for display

      • stateFromChar

        public static int stateFromChar​(char c)
        Convert a display character into a Nonogram cell state
        Parameters:
        c - the display character
        Returns:
        the cell state

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
